elements.title: Basilica of St. Mary of the Assumption
elements.contents: ... that the Basilica of St. Mary of the Assumption (pictured), a church in the Diocese of Columbus, was named a minor basilica by Pope Francis on the vigil of the Assumption of Mary?

elements.title: a Carolingian military sermon
elements.contents: ... that a Carolingian military sermon promises soldiers victory, provided they do not engage in sexual activity or looting?

elements.title: Bass Lake
elements.contents: ... that the slopes near Bass Lake at Flat Top Manor in North Carolina were covered with hundreds of apple trees?

elements.title: Rockstar Vancouver
elements.contents: ... that Rockstar Vancouver developed most of the "Beta 5" update for Counter-Strike?

elements.title: Nuri Ja'far
elements.contents: ... that Iraqi psychologist Nuri Ja'far, in his youth, was denied admission to the College of Medicine University of Baghdad by Harry Sinderson?

elements.title: Happier Than Ever
elements.contents: ... that Billie Eilish and Finneas O'Connell wrote the melody for their four-time Grammy-nominated song "Happier Than Ever" on an $80 guitar?

elements.title: Speedy Mashilo
elements.contents: ... that South African politician Speedy Mashilo was kidnapped for seven hours?

elements.title: The Random Years
elements.contents: ... that The Random Years includes a version of strip poker played to Antiques Roadshow?
